portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: Personal portfolio built with React, Tailwind, and Framer Motion.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce App
ecommerce.description: An E-Commerce Progressive Web App (PWA) that allows users to browse products, manage their cart, and place orders seamlessly across devices. Built for performance and offline support, the app delivers a fast, responsive, and reliable shopping experience with modern web technologies.

quiz.title: Quiz-Game
quiz.description: Quiz Battle Chrono is a fast-paced quiz game where players answer timed questions. Correct and quick answers earn more points, combining knowledge and speed in a competitive and engaging experience.

helpHub.title: HELP-HUB
helpHub.description: The HelpHub project is a web-based solidarity platform designed to connect donors with charitable organizations in a simple and fast way.
